attributes.action:
Stop the Brexit process NOW.
If you want all this nonsense to stop, sign now!
attributes.additional_details: Watch 30 minutes of almost any UK TV news program and you will understand why we are fed up and want an end to all this wrangling and seeing our politicians behaving like children instead of running the country.
attributes.background:
The 2016 referendum was 'advisory', the government did not need to start Brexit based on the result.

We, the electorate are fed up of the political wrangling that is now going on. 

Please think about this and sign the petition if you want to see this mess stopped.
